description: Yeehaa is a seasoned professional known for his expertise in digital transformation and innovation leadership. With experience in top-tier consulting firms and a master's in Business Administration, he focuses on strategic initiatives and impactful solutions. He has written insightful articles like 'Align the Misaligned' and 'Continental Drift' on internet fragmentation, global access, and media power.
blurb: Yeehaa is a seasoned professional in digital transformation with a rich career in strategy and solutions. Author of articles on internet fragmentation and media power.
